title: Type ID.
content:
Seen in totally Dublin Magazine.  
Ive been a fan of this font for ages, still dont have a clue what it is.

Thanks alot.

 [‹ iLounge Modern Sans Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906200418/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44905 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Ribbon-like 3D script - Silvestre {Alexander Tochilovsky} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906200418/http:/www.typophile.com/node/4151 "Go to next forum topic")
author: bobbygrotesk

comments.content:
Hi Bobby,

please [provide an image](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906200418/http:/www.typophile.com/node/18067) an a more [descriptive title](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906200418/http:/typophile.com/forum/typeid/faq/#Q_2), please.
